title: Allows school districts and BOCES units to provide administrative services together
summary: Allows school districts and BOCES units to agree or contract to provide administrative services together that they can provide on their own.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing school districts and boards of cooperative educational services to enter into agreements or contracts with each other to perform the same functions and provide the same services that each is authorized to perform or provide
